text: Big Sky is an ABC television series based on the book The Highway series of books by C. J. Box. The series aired on November 17, 2020 and renewed for a second season in May 2021. The show was announced January 2020 for the pilot order the show first previewed In May 2020 Category:2020 American television series debuts Category:2020s American drama television series Category:American crime drama television series Category:American mystery television series Category:2023 American television series endings
title: Big Sky (American TV series)
